text: Sakarias Opsahl (born 17 July 1999) is a Norwegian football player currently playing as a midfielder for Tromsø, on loan from Vålerenga. He joined Stabæk's youth setup from IL Heming, then Vålerenga's youth setup in 2016. He signed his first professional contract in August 2018. Opsahl made his debut for Vålerenga on 16 May 2019 against Strømsgodset, in a game that ended with a 2-0 win for Vålerenga. ==Career statistics== .
